author: Electricks94
body:
This PR adds a `MultiCollection` class to DataFormats/Common. This class holds references to `Collections` and can create a MultiSpan from these in place. Since the `MultiCollection` is lightweight, holding only references, it can be passed to the event flow. It allows the collection of data from different producers and then the creation of a combined view in later producers. With this workflow, copies of the data to the combined data structures are not necessary anymore.


FYI @felicepantaleo @leobeltra
title: Add MultiCollection to create MultiSpans from a lightweight holder class
